Articles.Content:
Is there any plan to fix the bug where there is no engine to select in training #3. It is very disappointing to have just bought this game and am not able to play the training portions. How will I learn if I cannot do these. 

Figured it out looking thorough old posts. Had to find it under the advanced tab.
Welcome to the forum @Xraydon56, your issue and solution has been moved to gameplay questions to make it easier to find for anyone else who has this problem.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2662942286

KSP 1.12.2 revamped the Swivel engine and hid the old one. By going into the advanced sort menus, you can find the old engine. The link goes to a guide with pictures that shows where to find it.

Edited December 17, 2021 by Stamp20
